definitions.Chao2 yang2: Chaoyang district in east and northeast Beijing, a county level district of Beijing municipality; Chaoyang prefecture level city in Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China; Chaoyang district of Changchun city 長春市|长春市, Jilin; Chaoyang county in Chaoyang 朝陽|朝阳, Liaoning;
definitions.chao2 yang2: to be exposed to the sun; in a position facing the sun;
